title: Night Light Bluetooth Speaker, SHAVA Jewel Portable Wireless Bluetooth Speaker Touch Control RGB Speaker 6 Color LED Themes Bedside Table Lamp, Speakerphone/PC/
feature: ALL IN ONE SPEAKER - Bluetooth speakers, Touch control LED mood lamp, wireless music player, hands-free speakerphone, table lamp

COLOR LIGHTS SPEAKER – This portable bluetooth speaker has 6 RGB color light themes, easily change by tapping speaker mesh. Speaker includes LED color theme flashes to the beat of music through bluetooth connection and audio streaming
PLAYING AUDIO - Enjoying your favourite music by Bluetooth wireless, Micro SD card playing and 3.5mm audio cable connection
SPEAKER PHONE - It has a Built-In Mic which supports excellent handsfree capability because of the noise cancellation software

BATTERY POWER AND PACKAGING - Packed with 2000mAH battery, this bluetooth speaker supports 8 hours of audio playtime. The black SHAVA package box which is well designed and presentable as a gift without wrapping. Our detail user manual have specific instructions on how to change between the color modes and operate this wireless portable speaker
